      • findAllEdges

        public void findAllEdges(RootBear.Graph g,
                         RootBear.Vertex northWall,
                         RootBear.Vertex southWall)
        Finds all the edges given the points. Only adds an edge if distance between them is less than the diameter of the bear.
        Parameters:
        g - - graph G
        northWall - - vertex of the north wall
        southWall - = vertex of the south wall
